reviewText:

If you can't think of anything else to buy them, it's O.K.

You really do not need 10000 words to desribe Benny Hill and his unbellievable antics. Simply said, and that's for me and my dear wife - Benny Hill is our number one therapy - for anything, including a dog bite -  with laughter. Carl & Margie Hodek

I've been watching Benny Hill for almost 15 years.  I've come to the point where I fall out of my chair laughing as soon as I see his face.  He doesn't even have to speak to get me laughing.  His comedy is of a different style, but if you watch, you will soon be rolling in the floor.  Very entertaining.
